item.title: The Ultimate Guide to Hiring the Right UX Design Agency

item.title: Design review of the AI Pin by Humane
item.description: As a product designer, I analysed Humane's first product, the AI Pin, and identified several critical challenges that need to be addressed. While the product's primary purpose of replacing mobile phones is laudable, it faces significant obstacles. Firstly, the device needs to offer a 10X better value proposition than the mobile phone to convince users to switch. However, this proved difficult as the AI Pin struggled to deliver on this promise, particularly in terms of call and message functionality, social media, calendar management, navigation, photography, entertainment, running apps, and more.
item.dc:creator: sharanx

item.title: Four Ways to Improve Patient Experience with UX Design Principles
item.description: Post my experience in designing an interface for a birthing hospital the importance of UX in this space was highlighted.
item.dc:creator: sharanx

item.title: Review of the Rabbit R1
item.description: A detailed review of the newly launched Rabbit R1, exploring its hardware and software design, its strategic position in the market and its potential challenges

item.title: Review of Replit, the Figma Killer

item.title: How to start designing for Web3
item.description: Web3 is a burgeoning field, but you can't just take Web2 designs and expect them to work in Web3. What should you keep in mind?

item.title: Designing for the Next Billion Users

item.title: DIY: A Raspberry Pi based Time Capsule

item.title: Five personal AI assistant devices reviewed and what they need to fix
